SELECT DISTINCT s.* FROM students s LEFT JOIN students_courses sc ON s.id = sc.student_id LEFT JOIN course_status cs ON sc.id = cs.student_course_id
s.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND
cs.status = #{status}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO students ( name, kana_name, nickname, e_mail, area, age, gender, telephone_number, remarks, is_deleted ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{kanaName}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{area}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{telephoneNumber}, #{remarks}, false )
